DOC.detailed_description: Anaesthesia induce inhalation 3 % sevoflurane . A predetermined bolus dose remifentanil inject 30 second . The LMA attempt 60 second bolus administration . The start dose remifentanil 0.5μg/kg step size 0.05μg/kg . If LMA insertion successful fail previous patient , decrement increment 0.05μg/kg remifentanil inject next patient , respectively .
